title: 11/10/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 11/10/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Aaron Rodgers' interview on The Pat McAfee show yesterday. Did Aaron backtrack a bit? Former NFL GM Mike Tannenbaum joins the show to explain why he thinks the Packers make the most sense for OBJ. And NFL Hall of Famer Joe Montana discusses how he and Jerry got along during their time in San Francisco together

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
